AboutHarrjP1: Harrj is a dynamic digital marketplace technology for seamlessly curated auctions that connects bidders from around the world.
historyP1: We have been supporting the auction industry since 2000. Over the years, we have expanded into new industry verticals and new geographies, through launching new marketplaces and acquiring complementary platforms. Being a trusted partner and voice for the industry remains our driving goal, every day.
strategyP1: Harrj's strategy is to lead the evolution of the auction industry from offline to online by providing auctioneers with the most complete and impactful set of integrated online services and capabilities in the world.

PrivacyP1: Established in 2021, Harrj is the world's largest, most trusted and dynamic marketplace for art and luxury. We empower our international community of collectors and  connoisseurs to discover, acquire, finance and consign fine art and rare objects.
PrivacyP2b: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. AboutUsdesc: Harrj is an application, platform and new concept for sale and purchase through live auctions through direct broadcasting
AboutUsdesc1: You can also view and buy goods by traditional ads Which guarantee the user see and buy and communicate with the advertiser
PrivacyP1: The user must agree to be bound by everything contained in these terms when using the site, accessing it, or registering for the service.
PrivacyP2a: Terms of use With your consent and to benefit from the services of the site, you must abide by the following:
PrivacyP2b: • Not to use any illegal means to access advertisements or other users' data, violate the policy and rights of the website, access the content of the site, or collect and collect information and data about the site or the site's customers, and benefit from it in any way or re-publish it.
PrivacyP2c: • Do not use the Site if you are not legally qualified. under 18 years old.
PrivacyP3: • Not to manipulate the prices of goods, whether in buying or selling, and causing harm to other users.
PrivacyP3a: • Not to post false, inaccurate, misleading, deceptive, defamatory, or defamatory advertisements or comments.
PrivacyP3b: • Not to be exposed to international policies or sovereigns, or esteemed personalities, or any discussions not related to legitimate buying and selling.
PrivacyP3c: • Not to infringe copyright, trademark, patent, advertising, dat abase or other proprietary or intellectual rights not to infringe others' proprietary, intellectual or patent rights.
PrivacyP4: • Not to announce the prohibited goods. The prohibited goods must be viewed.
PrivacyP4a: • Commitment to the real estate advertising controls set by the responsible authorities.
PrivacyP5: • Not to collect information about other site users for commercial purposes.
PrivacyP5b: • All goods prohibited by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
PrivacyP6c: • Stocks, portfolio management, currencies, marketing and everything related to that.
